meanings: leisure, leisure [spare] time, time to spare.
한가하다 free, disengaged, [서술적] be at leisure, have spare time [time to spare], be at loose ends, have leisure.

vlive.korean: 한가한 사람으로 보이니? what happened 5 years ago? 듣기 View video 플레이리스트 (Playlist) : 존잘 연하가 선배 꼬시는 법 [엑스엑스(XX)] - EP.05

vlive.english: when you have all the time in the world, that's the time!

vlive.korean: 음 그럼 혼자 바쁘고 우린 한가해서 가고 있다? Oh, does that mean we are able to go to the school because we're not as busy as you are? 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 웹드 배우들이 우리 학교에 왔다!!! [일진에게 찍혔을 때] 일찍 빵배송 이벤트
vlive.english: Oh, does that mean we are able to go to the school because we're not as busy as you are?

vlive.english: Do you want to get 1st place?
